content: stitches before bobble ssp p1 repeat row 1 & 2 until 15 15 18 18 21 21 stitches remain work flat until right front measures 7 5 7 5 8 5 8 5 9 9 inches from un- derarm ending after ws row cut yarn and place stitches on scrap yarn or holder for pattern questions email jennifer at jakelley sadler@gmail com this pattern copyright jennifer sadler 2017 photos copyright olive & west photography 2017 jaykayknits wordpress com 5 e f g d c a b a body length 15 inches b back hem 2 inches c bust when laying flat 15 25 17 5 20 22 5 24 75 27 25 inches d armhole length 7 5 7 5 8 5 8 5 9 9 inches e shoulder width 3 3 3 5 3 5 4 4 inches f neck opening 6 6 5 6 5 7 7 7 5 g neck depth 3 inches this pattern copyright jennifer sadler 2017 photos copyright olive & west photography 2017 jaykayknits wordpress com
